title-part.text: CRANES
LOAD-ENGAGING ELEMENTS OR DEVICES FOR CRANES, CAPSTANS, WINCHES, OR TACKLES

CPC-specific-text.text: specially adapted for lifting invalids A61G7/10;

reference.text: rope, cable, or chain winding mechanisms, braking or detent devices therefor B66D; specially adapted for nuclear reactors G21

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
B66C23/61 covered by B66C23/60
B66C23/683 covered by B66C23/68
B66C23/687 covered by B66C23/701
B66C23/69 covered by B66C23/701
B66C23/693 covered by B66C23/705
B66C23/697 covered by B66C23/707
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Load-engaging elements or devices attached to lifting or lowering gear of cranes or adapted for connection therewith

note.note-paragraph: In groups B66C1/00 and B66C3/00 the term "cranes" also covers capstans, winches, or tackles

title-part.text: Load-engaging elements or devices attached to lifting or lowering gear of cranes or adapted for connection therewith for transmitting lifting forces to articles or groups of articles

reference.text: fastening to cables or ropes F16G11/00

title-part.text: by suction means

reference.text: suction cups for attaching purposes F16B47/00

Multiple lifting units; More than one suction area
Other shapes, e.g. triangular or oval
